channel.title: PI] How to stop this dupe that is ruining my server urgent help please
channel.description:
I run a semi popular server that had 80+ online, I Woke up to complete terror, with everyone having 20+ phats, it seems as if they were duped. I got a pm on the forums saying that this was the dupe that people were following: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YaFWXTYcinI
How would i stop that dupe? Hiding my ip isn't easy cause people can view the pages source when on the webclient and get the link to download my client.jar > decompile > get ip that way. So yeah I need help stopping this dupe Please help me :(
